job.title: Data Science Analyst
job.description:
We are a digitally native company where innovation, design and engineering meet scale. We use the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspect.
We want you to join us to work for the biggest clients in tech, retail, travel, banking, ecommerce and media, revolutionizing and growing their core businesses while helping them (and you!) stay ahead of the curve. Be part of a company with the most cutting-edge practices and technologies plus a unique team.
We are looking for a Sr.
Data Science Analyst
for a
full time
position. Ideally in Pacific or Central time zone.
Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Sr Data Science Analyst to support the Adobe Spark and CC Education teams. This role is a strategic role, partnering with product managers and the leadership team making key decisions about the direction of our products. We’re looking for someone who has experience and passion about behavioral analysis for software products.
What you’ll do
Deliver user insights and analysis
Use SQL to analyze data and create a deeper understanding of our users and their behaviors
Identify opportunities and advocate for product improvement and optimization
Build dashboards and tools that provide insight around key metrics
Present findings to key leadership to influence product roadmaps
Perform ad hoc analysis and data modeling to understand and predict behavior trends, in order to optimize growth and engagement
Help our business make the right decisions
Partner closely with teams to understand their business objectives and provide data-driven solutions and recommendations.
Define the key business metrics to track the health of our business and drive better decision making
Emphasize the value of data/analytics and help drive a data-informed culture.
Drive our data platform
Partner directly with the product development teams on product instrumentation, product flow and data capture.
Help drive the strategy and roadmap for data/analytics tools and systems.
Become the subject matter expert on our data platform, including driving the requirements for our internal event logging systems, data processing engines, experimentation frameworks, and data visualization/dashboard tools.
Build trust in data by creating processes and frameworks that ensure data integrity and consistent data definitions.
What you need to succeed
Extensive experience with SQL
Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI
"Product Sense": Experience with software product behavior and funnel data
We are interested in hard-working, fast-learning talents and we have the know-how and scale to help you make your own career path. If you seek an entrepreneurial, flexible and team-oriented culture, come join us.
We are ready.
